97651.article_title: The time has come for a strategic electricity reserve
97651.article_abstract: Given recent geopolitical events, is it time to consider constructing a Strategic Electricity Reserve (SER) for national security reasons?

97650.article_title: 4 cybersecurity strategies for resilience in global crises
97650.article_abstract: Cybersecurity professionals can help protect their organizations from cyberattacks during this time of global crises.

97648.article_title: 3 in 5 organizations lost data over email in the past year
97648.article_abstract: Nearly 60% of organizations experienced data loss or exfiltration caused by an employee mistake on email in the last 12 months, according to new research from Tessian.

97646.article_title: Enterprise SIEMs detect fewer than 5 of the top 14 ATT&CK adversary techniques
97646.article_abstract: Enterprise SIEMs contain detections for fewer than 5 of the top 14 ATT&CK techniques employed by adversaries in the wild.

97647.article_title: The state of enterprise password management
97647.article_abstract: A survey by Pulse and Hitachi ID explored password management strategies used by IT, security and cybersecurity leaders.

97645.article_title: The next gold mine for hackers? Employee social media accounts
97645.article_abstract: Companies have to get smart about the risks of social media and take steps to address them.

97657.article_abstract: Security magazine covers the top five cyber threats in Q1 2022, as outlined by Kroll's "Q1 2022 Threat Landscape: Threat Actors Target Email for Access and Extortion" report.

97655.article_title: U.S. warns against hiring North Korean IT staff
97655.article_abstract: U.S. officials have warned businesses against hiring IT staff from North Korea, as they may expose themselves to legal consequences and insider risk.

97668.article_title: Beware potential ransomware attacks on QNAP NAS products
97668.article_abstract: QNAP Systems urges users to update their network attached storage (NAS) devices to avoid exposure to the Deadbolt ransomware.

97667.article_title: CISOs list top cyber threats to enterprises in 2022
97667.article_abstract: Chief information security officers (CISOs) from 14 countries list their top of mind cyber threats to their organizations.

97664.article_title: 3 key cybersecurity trends in the energy sector
97664.article_abstract: Energy executives anticipate life, property and environment-compromising cyberattacks on the sector, according to new cybersecurity research by DNV.

97666.article_title: 10% of IT leaders believe they can stop an advanced attack
97666.article_abstract: 90% of IT and cybersecurity professionals are not confident in their ability to stop an advanced cyberattack, according to the 2022 Global State of Security report from Infoblox.

97665.article_title: Pro-Russia cyberattacks target Italian Senate, Eurovision
97665.article_abstract: Pro-Russia hacker group Killnet has claimed responsibility for cyberattacks on many Italian institutions, declaring "war" on 10 countries including the United States.

97654.article_abstract: Hackers exploited a popular Discord bot to deceive users into clicking malicious links inside Discord servers of several popular nonfungible tokens (NFT) projects.
